# **Plumbing and Heating Services, AAFC, Lacombe Research and Development Centre**

## **Summary**

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) is seeking a contractor to provide plumbing and heating services to the Lacombe Research and Development Centre. The services will be provided on an "as and when requested" basis.

## **Notice Details**

* **Reference Number:** cb-7329-19345233
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** 01R11-24-C006A
* **Publication Date:** July 18, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** August 14, 2023, at 1:00 p.m.
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Unspecified
* **Regions of Delivery:** Alberta

## **Background**

The Lacombe Research and Development Centre requires plumbing and heating services to ensure smooth operations. The contractor will be responsible for providing services on an "as and when requested" basis. The contract will be for a period of one year, with an option to extend for up to three additional years.

## **Security Requirements**

The contractor must ensure that their personnel have a valid Reliability Status, granted or approved by AAFC, to access sensitive work sites.

## **Site Visit Information**

A site visit is recommended for bidders. The visit will take place on August 1, 2023, at 10:00 a.m. (MDT). Bidders must confirm their attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend to Colin Koversky, Facility Manager, by September 30, 2023.

## **Mandatory Technical Requirements**

Bids will be assessed on the basis of the entire requirement, including technical and financial evaluation criteria. A responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

## **Eligibility Requirements**

The bidder must meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive. The bidder's credentials and references must be verified to ensure they meet the requirements of the bid.

## **Notice and Documents**

The bid package, including the solicitation documents, can be downloaded from the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS). Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
